com.ebay.lightning.core.beans

Class URLTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.Task
      • com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.URLTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChainedURLTask

    public class URLTask
extends Task
    The URLTask class holds additional properties for the Task like proxy information. Additionally it holds information on the response of URL execution like status code, http body etc.
    Author:
    shashukla
    See Also:
    ChainedURLTask, Serialized Form

      • getHostIPAddress

        public String getHostIPAddress()
        Get the IP address of the host set by InetSocketAddressCache.
        Returns:
        the IP address of the host used to make connection. Returns the proxy IP if proxy is enabled via setUseProxyServer(boolean). Or else host IP is returned.

      • setHostIPAddress

        public void setHostIPAddress(String hostIPAddress)
        Set the IP address of the host.
        Parameters:
        hostIPAddress - the IP address of the host used to make connection

        Returns:
